name: remote_labor_index_2026
target: Highest AI agent automation rate (%) on Remote Labor Index by December 31, 2026
resolution_criteria: Read the top automation rate score from scale.com/leaderboard/rli on or around December 31, 2026. The value is the highest percentage shown for any AI agent.
key_evidence_to_watch: New model releases (GPT-6, Claude 5) - do they show proportional RLI gains?
Continual learning progress - does this become a significant factor?
Domain-specific breakthroughs - does progress vary across the 23 domains?
